title: Lotus in Moonlight - East Gate 4
description: 荷塘月色素食, at 朝阳区工人体育场4号门, has a peaceful atmosphere, located in famous Workers' Stadium of Beijing. Large menu with vegan options. Serves a large array of meatless dishes, made with tofu and related products, as well Chinese teas, desserts and sweets. Mock meat dishes include lamb curry, Shuizhuyu (spicy boiled fish) and Xinjiang style faux-lamb with cumin and nang.
streetAddress: East Gate 4, Workers Stadium, Chaoyang District
